channel.title: How would I go about jaring this client? [pics]
channel.description:
Hey, The client.class file is in locandclass ive tryed setting the class path as locandclass but the jar will not load. [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/32823198/Untitled.png[/img]
Help would be appreciated.

item.title: How would I go about jaring this client? [pics]
item.dc:creator: @Nz_skillz123 Nz skillz123
item.description:
@Nz_skillz123 wrote:

You have to jar locandclass and set the manifest as client, This would have to be the dumbest thing I have ever done.

Read full topic
item.source: How would I go about jaring this client? [pics]

Help me also please?
